verses.verse: Moreover the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> Job, <S%H347><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Shall he that contendeth <S%H7378><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> instruct <S%H3250><s%> him? he that reproveth <S%H3198><s%> God, <S%H433><s%> let him answer <S%H6030><s%> it.
Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am vile; <S%H7043><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall I answer <S%H7725><s%> thee? I will lay <S%H7760><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H3926><s%> my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Once <S%H259><s%> have I spoken; <S%H1696><s%> but I will not <S%H3808><s%> answer: <S%H6030><s%> yea, twice; <S%H8147><s%> but I will proceed no further. <S%H3254><s%> <S%H3808><s%>
Then answered <S%H6030><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H853><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the whirlwind, <S%H5591><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Gird up <S%H247><s%> thy loins <S%H2504><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> like a man: <S%H1397><s%> I will demand <S%H7592><s%> of thee, and declare <S%H3045><s%> thou unto me.
Wilt thou also <S%H637><s%> disannul <S%H6565><s%> my judgment? <S%H4941><s%> wilt thou condemn <S%H7561><s%> me, that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest be righteous? <S%H6663><s%>
Hast thou an arm <S%H2220><s%> like God? <S%H410><s%> or canst thou thunder <S%H7481><s%> with a voice <S%H6963><s%> like him? <S%H3644><s%>
Deck <S%H5710><s%> thyself now <S%H4994><s%> with majesty <S%H1347><s%> and excellency; <S%H1363><s%> and array <S%H3847><s%> thyself with glory <S%H1935><s%> and beauty. <S%H1926><s%>
Cast abroad <S%H6327><s%> the rage <S%H5678><s%> of thy wrath: <S%H639><s%> and behold <S%H7200><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that is proud, <S%H1343><s%> and abase <S%H8213><s%> him.
Look on <S%H7200><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that is proud, <S%H1343><s%> and bring him low; <S%H3665><s%> and tread down <S%H1915><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> in their place. <S%H8478><s%>
Hide <S%H2934><s%> them in the dust <S%H6083><s%> together; <S%H3162><s%> and bind <S%H2280><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> in secret. <S%H2934><s%>
Then will I <S%H589><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> confess <S%H3034><s%> unto thee that <S%H3588><s%> thine own right hand <S%H3225><s%> can save <S%H3467><s%> thee.
Behold <S%H2009><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> behemoth, <S%H930><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I made <S%H6213><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee; he eateth <S%H398><s%> grass <S%H2682><s%> as an ox. <S%H1241><s%>
Lo <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> his strength <S%H3581><s%> is in his loins, <S%H4975><s%> and his force <S%H202><s%> is in the navel <S%H8306><s%> of his belly. <S%H990><s%>
He moveth <S%H2654><s%> his tail <S%H2180><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a cedar: <S%H730><s%> the sinews <S%H1517><s%> of his stones <S%H6344><s%> are wrapped together. <S%H8276><s%>
His bones <S%H6106><s%> are as strong pieces <S%H650><s%> of brass; <S%H5154><s%> his bones <S%H1634><s%> are like bars <S%H4300><s%> of iron. <S%H1270><s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> is the chief <S%H7225><s%> of the ways <S%H1870><s%> of God: <S%H410><s%> he that made <S%H6213><s%> him can make his sword <S%H2719><s%> to approach <S%H5066><s%> unto him.

Surely <S%H3588><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> bring him forth <S%H5375><s%> food, <S%H944><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> play. <S%H7832><s%>
He lieth <S%H7901><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the shady trees, <S%H6628><s%> in the covert <S%H5643><s%> of the reed, <S%H7070><s%> and fens. <S%H1207><s%>
The shady trees <S%H6628><s%> cover <S%H5526><s%> him with their shadow; <S%H6752><s%> the willows <S%H6155><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%> compass him about. <S%H5437><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he drinketh up <S%H6231><s%> a river, <S%H5104><s%> and hasteth <S%H2648><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> he trusteth <S%H982><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he can draw up <S%H1518><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
He taketh <S%H3947><s%> it with his eyes: <S%H5869><s%> his nose <S%H639><s%> pierceth <S%H5344><s%> through snares. <S%H4170><s%>
